amr:
# ::snt Jews are definitely not Kosher.
(p / person
      :polarity -
      :mod (r / religious-group
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Kosher"))
      :mod (d / definite)
      :domain (p2 / person
            :mod r))

comment: God is great but $ is king.
amr:
# ::snt God is great but $ is king.
(c / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (g / great
            :domain (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "God")))
      :ARG2 (k / king
            :domain (p2 / person
                  :name n
                  :op1 "$")))

comment: The inverted Orwellian world in action. Satan is God and God is Satan!
amr:
# ::snt The inverted Orwellian world in action. Satan is God and God is Satan!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (w / world
            :mod (o / orwellian)
            :ARG1-of (ii / inverted-02)
            :ARG1-of (a / act-02))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "God")
                  :domain (p2 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Satan")))
            :op2 (p3 / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "God")
                  :domain p2)))
